Statute.Title: Government Property Traffic Act
Statute.OtherLangTitle: (Circulation sur les terrains de l’État, Loi relative à la)

Minister.Text: Minister of Public Works and Government Services (1996, c. 16, s. 60(2)); Minister of Transport

CIF.Text: CIF, 1992, c. 47, s. 72.1, as enacted by 1996, c. 7, s. 38, in force 01.08.96 see SI/96‑56; item 6 of the Schedule repealed before coming into force 31.12.2011 see 2008, c. 20, s. 3
CIF, 1994, c. 26, s. 33(1) repealed before coming into force 31.12.2012 see 2008, c. 20, s. 3
CIF, 1996, c. 7, ss. 38 and 42 in force 31.07.96 see SI/96‑57
CIF, 1999, c. 31, s. 126 in force on assent 17.06.99
